query: SELECT 'districts' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM districts WHERE id = 'Illinous' OR name LIKE '%Illinous%' UNION ALL SELECT 'campuses', COUNT(*) FROM campuses WHERE districtId = 'Illinous' UNION ALL SELECT 'people', COUNT(*) FROM people WHERE districtId = 'Illinous'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2urQ2Y5ox8SwiQm.e293c8dbbee4 --database UQnsC7UkUSExcoqL3bpybA --execute SELECT 'districts' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM districts WHERE id = 'Illinous' OR name LIKE '%Illinous%' UNION ALL SELECT 'campuses', COUNT(*) FROM campuses WHERE districtId = 'Illinous' UNION ALL SELECT 'people', COUNT(*) FROM people WHERE districtId = 'Illinous'
